title: Hunter Douglas Blinds Shades | Official Hunter Douglas Site
description: Hunter Douglas Offers the Finest Quality Window Treatments Including Blinds, Shades and Shutters. Save up to $1200. Millions Sold, Lifetime Guarantee.
cleaned_text: INNOVATIVE SHADE DESIGNS INNOVATIVE SHADE DESIGNS We can connect you with a window-treatment expert in your area. No obligation. We design products with intent, for beautiful window treatments that meet your specific needs. New for 2023—a Federal Tax Credit up to $1,200! Save energy year-round—and earn a NEW Federal Tax Credit of up to $1,200 on select energy-efficient shade styles We can connect you with a window-treatment expert in your area. No obligation. With PowerView® Automation, you can schedule window treatments to open, close or adjust somewhere in between—whenever you desire.
